    • Method Detail

      • go

        public void go()
        throws IOException
        Entry point of the thread.
        Overrides:
        go in class UnilateralSortMerger.SpillingThread
        Throws:
        IOException - Exceptions that prohibit correct completion of the work may be thrown by the thread.

      • mergeChannels

        protected UnilateralSortMerger.ChannelWithBlockCount mergeChannels(List<UnilateralSortMerger.ChannelWithBlockCount> channelIDs,
                                                       List<List<MemorySegment>> readBuffers,
                                                       List<MemorySegment> writeBuffers)
                                                            throws IOException
        Merges the sorted runs described by the given Channel IDs into a single sorted run. The merging process uses the given read and write buffers. During the merging process, the combiner is used to reduce the number of values with identical key.
        Overrides:
        mergeChannels in class UnilateralSortMerger.SpillingThread
        Parameters:
        channelIDs - The IDs of the runs' channels.
        readBuffers - The buffers for the readers that read the sorted runs.
        writeBuffers - The buffers for the writer that writes the merged channel.
        Returns:
        The ID of the channel that describes the merged run.
        Throws:
        IOException
